entry.tran: 劳改营；（前苏联的）古拉格劳改营
entry.def: A gulag is a prison camp where conditions are extremely bad and the prisoners are forced to work very hard. The name gulag comes from the prison camps in the former Soviet Union.

means.word_mean: 1. a Russian prison camp for political prisoners
